tool.name: ODV
tool.description: interactive plotting tool for geo-referenced data
tool.command: export HOME=\$PWD && mkdir -p Documents/ODV/.temp/ && mkdir -p Documents/ODV/data/outputs && chmod 777 Documents/ODV/ -R && cp '$infile' './Documents/ODV/data/$infile.display_name' && /init ; mv ./Documents/ODV/data/outputs/ ./output && rm ./Documents -rf

param.name: infile
param.label: Netcdf or tabular text file. For text file, odv format is recommanded.

tool.help: `ODV <https://odv.awi.de/>`_ plots geo-referenced and other arrays from netCDF, HDF, GRIB, and other datasets. For now, Galaxy is supporting only netCDF and text files as odv text file as input.
